name: CAPSANTAL FS
description: CAPSANTAL FS is a natural pigments that makes it possible to obtain a high level pigmentantion of the broiler skin, the egg yolk and the flesh of trout and salmon.Capsantal FS is a red pigmenter, mainly based on trans-capsanthin, obtained through a highly developed process of extraction from selected varieties of peppers (Capsicum annum), carefully processed to potentiate the natural red color of their pigments.
